CustomField.description: This field indicates if Product State Config is used to determine if a record is active (checked) or inactive (unchecked). Used in connection with a feature specific (e.g. Covenant) setting is active. Default is unchecked (inactive).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field indicates if Product State Config is used to determine if a record is active (checked) or inactive (unchecked). Used in connection with a feature specific (e.g. Covenant) setting is active. Default is unchecked (inactive).
CustomField.label: Activate
